roles.title: Data Engineer
roles.description: Design and build scalable data pipelines and infrastructure to support analytics and machine learning workloads.

roles.title: Senior Data Engineer
roles.description: Lead the design of enterprise data platforms, mentor junior engineers, and establish best practices for data pipeline development.

roles.title: Data Analyst
roles.description: Analyse business data to uncover trends, build dashboards, and deliver actionable insights to stakeholders.

roles.title: Senior Data Analyst
roles.description: Lead analytical projects, define KPIs, and translate complex data findings into strategic business recommendations.

roles.title: Business Intelligence Analyst
roles.description: Develop and maintain BI dashboards, create data models, and support data-driven decision making across the organisation.

roles.title: Analytics Engineer
roles.description: Bridge the gap between data engineering and analytics by building clean, tested, and documented data models.

roles.title: Data Architect
roles.description: Define enterprise data architecture, governance frameworks, and integration strategies across multiple data platforms.

roles.title: Database Administrator
roles.description: Manage, tune, and maintain production databases to ensure high availability, performance, and security.

roles.title: Data Governance Specialist
roles.description: Establish data quality standards, manage metadata catalogues, and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

roles.title: ETL Developer
roles.description: Build and maintain ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from diverse sources into warehouses.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Design, develop, and maintain software applications following engineering best practices and agile methodologies.

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer
roles.description: Lead technical design and implementation of complex systems, conduct code reviews, and mentor junior developers.

roles.title: Frontend Developer
roles.description: Build responsive and performant user interfaces for web applications using modern frontend frameworks.

roles.title: Backend Developer
roles.description: Develop and maintain server-side applications, APIs, and microservices to power web and mobile products.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Develop end-to-end web applications spanning frontend interfaces and backend services.

roles.title: Mobile Developer
roles.description: Build and maintain native or cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android.

roles.title: QA Engineer
roles.description: Design and execute test strategies, automate testing pipelines, and ensure software quality across releases.

roles.title: Software Architect
roles.description: Define system architecture, technology standards, and design patterns for large-scale software solutions.

roles.title: Site Reliability Engineer
roles.description: Ensure reliability and uptime of production systems through automation, monitoring, and incident response.

roles.title: DevSecOps Engineer
roles.description: Integrate security practices into the CI/CD pipeline and ensure secure software delivery processes.

roles.title: Cloud Engineer
roles.description: Design, deploy, and manage cloud infrastructure across public cloud platforms.

roles.title: Senior Cloud Engineer
roles.description: Lead cloud architecture decisions, optimise costs, and implement advanced infrastructure patterns.

roles.title: DevOps Engineer
roles.description: Automate build, test, and deployment pipelines and manage infrastructure-as-code.

roles.title: Platform Engineer
roles.description: Build and maintain internal developer platforms that accelerate software delivery across engineering teams.

roles.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
roles.description: Design cloud-native solutions, advise on migration strategies, and ensure architecture meets business needs.

roles.title: Infrastructure Engineer
roles.description: Provision and manage on-premises and cloud infrastructure, focusing on reliability and automation.

roles.title: Cloud Security Engineer
roles.description: Secure cloud environments through IAM policies, compliance checks, and security automation.

roles.title: Release Engineer
roles.description: Manage software release processes, versioning strategies, and deployment coordination across teams.

roles.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
roles.description: Monitor security events, investigate threats, and respond to security incidents in a SOC environment.

roles.title: Penetration Tester
roles.description: Conduct authorised simulated attacks on systems and networks to identify security vulnerabilities.

roles.title: Security Engineer
roles.description: Design and implement security controls, automate security tooling, and harden infrastructure.

roles.title: Security Operations Centre Lead
roles.description: Lead a team of SOC analysts, define incident response playbooks, and manage security monitoring operations.

roles.title: Governance Risk and Compliance Analyst
roles.description: Assess organisational risk posture, ensure regulatory compliance, and develop security policies.

roles.title: Application Security Engineer
roles.description: Perform code reviews, application vulnerability assessments, and integrate security into the SDLC.

roles.title: Incident Response Analyst
roles.description: Respond to and investigate security breaches, conduct forensics, and develop remediation plans.

roles.title: Machine Learning Engineer
roles.description: Build, train, and deploy machine learning models into production environments at scale.

roles.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
roles.description: Lead ML system design, establish model monitoring frameworks, and drive MLOps best practices.

roles.title: Data Scientist
roles.description: Apply statistical and machine learning techniques to solve business problems and generate predictive insights.

roles.title: Senior Data Scientist
roles.description: Lead complex modelling initiatives, design experiments, and translate findings into strategic business impact.

roles.title: NLP Engineer
roles.description: Develop natural language processing systems for text classification, entity recognition, and language generation.

roles.title: Computer Vision Engineer
roles.description: Build image and video analysis systems using deep learning for tasks like detection, segmentation, and recognition.

roles.title: AI Research Scientist
roles.description: Conduct research on novel AI methods, publish findings, and prototype advanced models for applied use.

roles.title: MLOps Engineer
roles.description: Operationalise machine learning models by building serving infrastructure, monitoring, and retraining pipelines.

roles.title: Product Manager
roles.description: Define product vision, manage the roadmap, and collaborate with engineering and design to deliver user value.

roles.title: Senior Product Manager
roles.description: Drive product strategy for a portfolio of products, influence senior leadership, and own key business metrics.

roles.title: Engineering Manager
roles.description: Manage a team of software engineers, drive technical decisions, and align engineering output with business goals.

roles.title: Scrum Master
roles.description: Facilitate agile ceremonies, remove impediments, and coach teams on Scrum practices to improve delivery.

roles.title: Technical Programme Manager
roles.description: Coordinate cross-team technical initiatives, manage dependencies, and ensure programme milestones are met.

roles.title: IT Project Manager
roles.description: Plan and deliver IT projects on time and within budget, managing resources, risks, and stakeholder expectations.

roles.title: Head of Data
roles.description: Define the organisational data strategy, lead data teams, and drive data culture and governance across the company.
